numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows optimism about future generations for people between 15 and 24 years old.
2. The graph shows optimism about future generations for people who are 40 years old or older.
3. I notice that many countries have 15-24 year olds who have hope for future generations.
4. I notice that only Morocco has 40+ year olds who have hope for future generations.
5. I notice that only India has 40+ year olds who have hope for future generations.
6. I notice that only Nigeria has 40+ year olds who have hope for future generations.
7. There is a difference between the two age groups.
8. I wonder why this difference exists.
9. I wonder what the leading opinions of the 15-24 year olds are.
10. I wonder what the leading opinions of the 40+ year olds are.
12. I am between 15 and 24 years old.
13. I have optimism for future generations.
14. I hope that the world gets it together.
15. I hope that the next generations can thrive.
16. The title of this graph is "Optimism For Future Generations Around the World".
